name: Mega Racing
description:
You have missions in rush hours and you have to arrive on time, but it's not an easy task, it depend on your driving skill!
Complete each of your mission by score more than 1000 points and earn more money to upgrade your car or even buy a new super car .
The road with full of traffic will challenge you!
Feature:
+ Tens of super car to unlock .
+ Many road to race.
+ Upgrade all your gear for speed and stability.
